head.title: Publicis to Disclose Y.& R. Merger Talks

hedline.hl1: Publicis to Disclose Y.& R. Merger Talks

abstract.p: Publicis SA is to formally announce that its board has authorized management to enter into merger talks with Young & Rubicam (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Publicis S.A. in Paris is to formally announce today that its board has authorized management to enter into talks with Young & Rubicam Inc. in New York, executives close to the negotiations said. The talks come after discussions of a merger between Y.& R. and the WPP Group in London broke down late last week.

If the talks between Publicis and Y.& R. make progress, Publicis could announce as soon as this week a deal to acquire Y.& R. for about $5 billion, creating the world's fourth-largest agency company in terms of billings and revenue. Such a deal would be the largest ever in advertising.
